Patch.Name: Check User Dot File Permissions (Detect Only)

Vulnerability.Title: Check User Dot File Permissions
Vulnerability.Description:
While the system administrator can establish secure permissions for users' "dot" files, the users can easily override these.
Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually.
